author: Sephiko

text: Well it's been 25 years since this game's release. I've always said my favorite games﻿ in the series are the 8-bit ones, so that would be Mega Man 1-6 and 9-10. My three favorite are probably MM2, MM3 and MM9 in no specific order. There's just something the gameplay and the visual style of the 8-bit games that stick with me. I do like the X and RPG series too. This theme invokes the "nearing the end" aspect with a tint of sadness, which represents﻿ this series pretty well right now.
author: SupraDarky
